Specifications

Field Type Flags Description
base_color String Blankable The principal color used on the report
font_color String Blankable The color of the font on the report. We recommand the use of a dark font (lightness <= 0.2)
font_name String Blankable Name of the font to use on Vosae's reports.
Common fonts can be used, such as "Helvetica", "Times Roman", etc.
Will default to Vosae's font, Bariol.
If the provided font is not supported, we fallback to the closest one
font_size Integer Blankable Base font size on reports.
Note that all sizes (from titles to subnotes) depends on this
force_bw Boolean Blankable Force all reports to be in grayscale
language String Blankable Default language for reports
paper_size String Unicode string data. Ex: "Hello World"
